channel.title: Lab 3 Networking Diagrams :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Here are some helpful networking diagrams to better explain the desired state before and after the end of Lab 3. In all of these diagrams, I am using a sample network with the IP address 192.168.40.0. You will have to adapt the IPs to match your network configuration. In addition, each network address will need to be updated with your unique eID as directed in the lab assignment. Before Lab 3 Once youâ€™ve completed Task 1 of Lab 3, you should have three virtual machines connected to your network.
